EmailTemplate.description: SFDC1-7001: Email template to notify Opportunity owner when TMC status is inactive
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Opportunity Owner When TMC Status Is Inactive
EmailTemplate.subject: Your opportunity's been removed from TMC agenda
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.OwnerFirstName},
Please note that your opportunity:
Opportunity Name: {!Opportunity.Name} Link to your Opportunity: {!Opportunity.Link}
Previously scheduled for review on an upcoming Transaction Management Committee meeting, has now been removed from the schedule.
You will receive a notification if/when it is rescheduled for a future date.
Thank you.
Transactions Management Committee
